Text: hiLiz Hello from Rice Just thought Id drop an email to see it works The above address is my email here at Rice on sabbatical If you mail to thats my address at TAMU I recommend the TAMU address because I have those messages copied here so I will get them no matter where I am But I sometimes dont see the Rice messages if they come while I am back home So last I heard I thought you were working as an attorney in a private practice But now you must be working for Enron Seems like everybody in Houston is working in the awl bidness these days I hosted a career discussion group for our grad students last week and invited TAMU alums to come talk about careers in oceanography All were driven by the offshore energy industry in some way either energy companies service companies or regulatory agencies except for one guy from the Navy And they all said dont plan to keep the same job for more than years Nice to see you at the wedding Well have to plan to get together some time Bye Will William W Sager Deptartment of Oceanography Texas AM University College Station TX ph cell ph fax On Sabbatical Rice University Department of Geology Geophysics Houston TX
